title: Advertising Pod details information

xdm:ID.title: Ad Break ID
xdm:ID.description: The ID of the ad break.

xdm:friendlyName.title: Pod Friendly Name
xdm:friendlyName.description: The friendly name of the Ad Break.

xdm:index.title: Ad In Pod Position (Ad Break Start)
xdm:index.description: The index of the ad inside the parent ad break start, for example, the first ad has index 0 and the second ad has index 1.

xdm:offset.title: Pod Offset
xdm:offset.description: The offset of the ad break inside the content, in seconds.
